  easystats, sjmisc, # data analysis
  ggpubr, ggwordcloud, # visualization
  gt, gtExtras, # fancy tables

```{r table-schedule-b}
#| echo: false 

new_schedule_d %>% 
    gt::gt() %>% 
    gt::fmt_markdown() %>% 
    gt::tab_options(
        table.width = gt::pct(75), 
        table.font.size = "12px"
    ) %>% 
    gtExtras::gt_theme_nytimes() %>% 
    # mark session
    gtExtras::gt_highlight_rows(
        rows = 16,
        fill = "#C50F3C", alpha = 0.15,
        bold_target_only = TRUE,
        target_col = Topic
    ) %>%
    # mark past Session
    gt::tab_style(
        style = cell_text(
            style = "italic", 
            color = "grey"),
        location = cells_body(
            columns = everything(), 
            rows = c(1:12, 14:15)
        )
    )
```
